articles.author: Andrew McDonald
articles.title: Liz Truss apologizes to UK as she tries to keep troubled premiership on track - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: The British prime minister also insists she will ‘definitely’ lead her party into the next general election.
articles.content:
LONDON Is it too late now to say sorry?
After weeks of market turmoil and countless U-turns, British Prime Minister Liz Truss apologized late Monday for what she called “the mistakes that have been … [+1627 chars]

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Lawmakers will try to oust UK PM Liz Truss this week: Report - The Indian Express
articles.description: Britain, engulfed in a political crisis, has lost three prime ministers since it voted to leave the European Union in 2016.
articles.content: British lawmakers will try to oust Prime Minister Liz Truss this week despite Downing Street’s warning that it could trigger a general election, the Daily Mail reported.More than 100 members of parli… [+1179 chars]
